item.title: FEOTD (Firefox Extension of the Day): del.icio.us
item.description: If you do not know and use on-line social bookmarking site Del.icio.us, take a break now and go there. Currently owned by Yahoo, is Del.icio.us is a one of many social bookmarking tools out. Probably not the one with most features, not the one with coolest user interface - but pretty good one and certainly winner for me. I have been struggling with the problem of how to keep my collections of URL's under control for several years.
